modName: Unique Everything - meshes textures skeletons per Race
summary: Allows for different body replacers per race; Meshes, textures, and skeletons for males and females of all races.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/316n1hh.gif[/IMG][/center]

Unique EVERYTHIIING
- Based on [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5968]UniqueBodies[/url] by rainrtw
- Inspired by Dreamtourist\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9452]CustomBody/CustomArmor[/url] and 4uDIK1\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6667]remix of Unique Bodies[/url]

What it does:
Allows for different body replacers per race. This includes meshes, textures, and skeletons for both males and females of all races.

How it works:
[b]Option A[/b]: Download the esp and dummy folder structure.  It is up to you to place the replacers and correlating textures of your liking in the appropriate folders. 
Included in each folder is a text file called \"Files.txt\" that has a list of exactly which files belong in that folder.

[b]Option B[/b]: Download the Starter Pack and it does all the work for you. Folders are already populated with body replacer meshes, textures and skeletons. If you choose this option and already use replacers, it is highly recommended that you back those up first.

UPDATE: 2.0 uses vanilla naming conventions for the mesh and texture files. This should make it a lot easier to install and overwrite with the replacers of your choice.

***Starter Pack - Included races setup***:
[b]Males[/b] - bodies courtesy of 4uDIK, using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6667]4rb Real Body[/url] meshes and textures. 
Nord and Orc skeletons are tweaked to make them bulkier.
[b]Females[/b] -
High Elves: Meshes - UNP with BBP. Textures and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6667]original UNP by Dimon[/url].
Wood Elves: Meshes - UNP Blessed with BBP. Face texture by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]Navetsea[/url]. Body texture and original UNP by Dimon.  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14899]UNPBlessed by calyps[/url].
Breton, Dark Elf, Imperial, Nord, Orc, Khajiit and Argonian: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE v3 by Caliente[/url]. Each body type is a bit different. Some are very different. Custom body types are my own design, using Caliente\'s amazing BodySlide tool with moonballz\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11920]extra sliders[/url]. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]Body and face textures[/url] by the talented Navetsea. 
The one exception is Khajiit - the body texture included is a mashup of Caliente\'s and Kisa\'s textures while the face is CoverKhajiit.
All females use variations of Cherry Hotaling\'s original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC skeleton and physics[/url].

***Potential conflict***: Extended Slider Colors. That mod affects the head parts, as does this one and so it might cause issues. 

To make it easy (well...easier...), here is the folder structure and what goes in them:

MESHES:
Data > meshes > actors > character > Argonian
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > Breton
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > DarkElf
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > Elder
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > HighElf
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > Imperial
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > Khajiit
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > Nord
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > Orc
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > Redguard
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data

Data > meshes > actors > character > WoodElf
Body/head/hands/feet meshes and .tri data


Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets
Generic skeleton, male, for backup purposes and in the event that anything mod-added needs it.

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > Argonian
skeletonbeast (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > Breton
skeleton (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > DarkElf
skeleton (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > Elder
skeleton (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > HighElf
skeleton (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > Imperial
skeleton (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > Khajiit
skeletonbeast (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > Nord
skeleton (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > Orc
skeleton (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > Redguard
skeleton (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets > WoodElf
skeleton (male)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female
Generic skeleton, female, for backup purposes and in the event that anything mod-added needs it.

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > Argonian
skeletonbeast (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > Breton
skeleton (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > DarkElf
skeleton (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > Elder
skeleton (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > HighElf
skeleton (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > Imperial
skeleton (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > Khajiit
skeletonbeast (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > Nord
skeleton (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > Orc
skeleton (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > Redguard
skeleton (female)

Data > meshes > actors > character > character assets female > WoodElf
skeleton (female)

TEXTURES:
Data > textures > actors > character > Argonian
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > Breton
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > DarkElf
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > Elder
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > HighElf
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > Imperial
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > Khajiit
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > Nord
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > Orc
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > Redguard
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > WoodElf
Body/head/hands/feet textures and detail maps

Data > textures > actors > character > female
Generic body/hands/feet textures in case anything needs them.

Data > textures > actors > character > femaleold
Generic body/hands/feet textures in case anything needs them.

Data > textures > actors > character > male
Generic body/hands/feet textures in case anything needs them.

Data > textures > actors > character > maleold
Generic body/hands/feet textures in case anything needs them.

Recommendations:
While this works just fine without it, I highly recommend [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12951]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]. That mod definitely compliments this one. Initially, I had an issue with lip synching not working when using Unique Bodies with ECE. But I fixed it. The fix is included here. You can load UniqueEverything before or after ECE with no issues.

I personally use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]Dimon\'s UNP[/url] for my High Elves and Wood Elves. I use the fabulous Caliente\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE[/url] (with BBP) for everyone else, using custom bodies created with BodySlide. I also use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11920]additional sliders[/url] that Moonballz created (and continues to develop off-Nexus). While I was developing this mod, it occurred to me that I could probably use customized CBBE bodies for all races considering the amazing range one can achieve with BodySlide.
As for males, it\'s 4uDIK1\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6667]real body meshes and textures[/url], all the way.

If you want even more variety in your game, try out these mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16668]The Spice of Life[/url] - NPC body variety (allows you to assign bodies and textures for specific NPCs)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8720]Custom Races[/url] - Set up your own Player race and use different meshes/textures than other NPCs of the same race
author: angelmeats
